ðŸ“– Summary: Textual Paint is a terminal-based image editor that brings the classic MS Paint experience to the command line. It offers a comprehensive set of tools, file format support, and features like undo/redo, localization, and dark mode, enabling users to create and edit images directly within their terminal.
